X1subscript𝑋1X_{1}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: 機動資産/総資産比率; X2subscript𝑋2X_{2}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: 留保利益/総資産比率; X3subscript𝑋3X_{3}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: 利息と税金を控除した利益/総資産比率; X4subscript𝑋4X_{4}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 4 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: 株式の時価総額/総負債比率; X5subscript𝑋5X_{5}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 5 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: 総売上高/総資産比率。
